title: Naruto
description: A young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village.

title: Attack on Titan
description: In a world where humanity resides within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans, Eren vows to destroy every last Titan.

title: One Piece
description: Luffy and his pirate crew in search of the legendary treasure called "One Piece" to become the Pirate King.

title: My Hero Academia
description: A boy born without superpowers in a world where they are common, but still dreams of becoming a superhero.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing the personâ€™s name while picturing their face.

title: Bleach
description: A teenager who obtains the powers of a Soul Reaper, a death personification similar to the Grim Reaper.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: A college student who gets turned into a half-ghoul and must deal with societal issues while surviving on human flesh.

title: Sword Art Online
description: Players of a virtual reality MMORPG find themselves trapped and fighting for survival.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers use alchemy to try to resurrect their mother, but unleash something much more sinister.

title: Steins;Gate
description: A group of friends who discover a way to send messages to the past and its dramatic repercussions.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: Goku and his friends defend the Earth against an assortment of villains ranging from intergalactic space fighters and conquerors.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: Follows the lives of a bounty hunter crew traveling in their spaceship called the Bebop.

title: Demon Slayer
description: A young boy becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered and his younger sister turned into a demon.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: A teenage boy is recruited by his father to pilot a giant robot under the city Tokyo-3 and battle beings known as Angels.

title: Code Geass
description: A prince given the power to control people with a command teams up with rebels to take down the empire.

title: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World
description: A boy is summoned to another world and has the ability to rewind death, reliving his life to find the right path.

title: One Punch Man
description: A superhero so strong that he can defeat any opponent with a single punch grows bored by the lack of challenge.

title: Mob Psycho 100
description: A young psychic strives to live a normal life and control his abilities.

title: Fate/Stay Night
description: Several mages summon legendary heroes to fight for them in a battle for an omnipotent wish-granting device.
